configfiles.configfile:
###For more options see: http://boevalab.com/FREEC/tutorial.html#CONFIG ###
[general] chrLenFile = "$chrLenFile" window = "${window}" ploidy = "${ploidy}" outputDir = "${outputDir}"
#sex=XY breakPointType=4 chrFiles = /pathToChromosomeFastaFiles/Human/hg19/chromosomes/
maxThreads=6
breakPointThreshold=1.2 noisyData=TRUE printNA=FALSE
readCountThreshold=50
[sample] mateFile = "${input_sample_file}" inputFormat = bam mateOrientation = 0
[control] mateFile = "${input_control_file}" inputFormat = "${input_control_file.format}" mateOrientation = 0
[BAF] SNPfile = /bioinfo/users/vboeva/Desktop/annotations/hg19_snp131.SingleDiNucl.1based.txt minimalCoveragePerPosition = 5
[target] captureRegions = /EXOME-SEQ/TruSeq_exome_targeted_regions.hg19.bed
